title: Silver Pole Flowers
description:
[b][u]English:[/b]
From the author of Harukana Receive comes a manga about pole dancing. 
Hana is ashamed of the fact that her late mother was a famous pole dancer, as her family considered it promiscuous. Karin saw her dance and was enthralled by it. 
This is the story of two girls, linked together by a single pole.
[hr][b][u]Spanish / Español:[/b]
[spoiler]Del autor de Harukana Recibe viene un manga sobre Pole-Dance. 
Hana se avergüenza del hecho de que su difunta madre fuera una famosa bailarina de Pole-Dance, como su familia consideraba es promiscuo.
Hana y Karin son 2 chicas que tienen una forma distinta sobre la perspectiva del Pole-Dance una aferrándose a la idea antigua y la otra a tomarlo como un simple [/spoiler]
